code: import{CHECK_LOGIN,LOGIN_USER_SUCCESSFUL,API_ERROR,LOGOUT_USER,LOGOUT_USER_SUCCESS}from'./actionTypes';export var checkLogin=function checkLogin(user,history){return{type:CHECK_LOGIN,payload:{user:user,history:history}};};export var loginUserSuccessful=function loginUserSuccessful(user){return{type:LOGIN_USER_SUCCESSFUL,payload:user};};export var apiError=function apiError(error){return{type:API_ERROR,payload:error};};export var logoutUser=function logoutUser(history){return{type:LOGOUT_USER,payload:{history:history}};};export var logoutUserSuccess=function logoutUserSuccess(){return{type:LOGOUT_USER_SUCCESS,payload:{}};};
